hero.title: Portfolio Website
hero.oneLiner: A personal portfolio built with agentic AI, showcasing the future of software development.

context.text: This website is more than just a showcase of my work; it's a demonstration of a new way of building. Created using advanced agentic coding workflows, this project moves beyond simple 'vibe coding' to a structured, iterative, and AI-partnered development process. It represents a shift where the developer acts as a high-level architect while AI agents handle implementation, verification, and asset generation.

bullets: Next.js 14 (App Router) for performance and SEO
Tailwind CSS for rapid, cohesive styling
Framer Motion for smooth, premium interactions

decisions.why: To explore the capabilities of modern AI in complex project management and code generation.
decisions.tradeoff: Requires managing agent context and reviewing plans rather than just writing code.

decisions.why: Maintained complete control over the 'premium' aesthetic without fighting library defaults.
decisions.tradeoff: More initial CSS setup, but greater long-term flexibility.

worked: Rapid iteration on design and content.
Seamless integration of new features via AI planning.
Automated tasks (like screenshots) saved manual effort.
didnt: Occasional context limits required re-explaining project structure.

outcome.text: The result is a responsive, high-performance portfolio that not only houses my work but serves as a case study in itself. It demonstrates that AI can be a partner in creativity, not just a tool for automation.

reflection.text: Building this portfolio with AI reinforced that the future of coding is collaborative. The 'magic' isn't in generating code, but in orchestrating intent.

skills.label: Next.js
skills.description: App directory and React Server Components.
